short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developed by Lee Kinsella. Simply drag and drop the games to desired position for the ESPN Pigskin Pick'em confidence pool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drag and drop your matchups for the ESPN Pigskin Pick'em confidence pool on pages starting with the URL https://fantasy.espn.com/games/nfl-pigskin-pickem-2024 instead of having to click on the dropdown button and choose from the modal window. This saves time and reduces a lot of confusion and distractions when trying to get your confidence picks just right.

Like the extension? Feel free to throw me some bones on Venmo!
